title: Gontr Mael
content:
mised Victory: On a hit, possibly inflict Guiding Bolt upon the target. Gontr Mael: Glowing: This object shines with a glowing light in a radius of 6m. Celestial Haste: 5 Turns Haste without Lethargic condition at the end. Bolt of Celestial Light: Deal 1d8 Radiant damage. Frighten your target with intimidating arrows. After attacking, ranged weapon attacks with Gontr Mael deal an additional 1~4 Radiant damage.

BG3 Gontr Mael Location & Where to Find

Location: Steel Watch Foundry, Lower City, B
